short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add voice-to-text feature to ChatGPT search box.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your experience by effortlessly adding voice input to your interactions! Introducing the "Activate Voice Input" button: a seamless fusion of technology and simplicity. Click this button to enable voice recognition. As you speak, your words are instantly transformed into text and gracefully placed within the text input field. The stylish and intuitive button showcases a microphone icon, reminding you of its powerful speech-to-text capabilities. The vibrant green hue signifies readiness, inviting you to engage with the voice input feature. Embrace efficiency and innovation with this innovative addition to your ChatGPT experience.
